items.hook_question: What if everything you see is just a small part of the universe?
items.mini_task: Look at the night sky and imagine what's invisible.

items.kid_gloss: Powerful space holes that pull everything in.
items.hook_question: Could we ever escape a black hole?
items.mini_task: Create a small model using a ball and fabric to mimic gravity.

items.hook_question: Is there life on planets outside our solar system?
items.mini_task: Make a list of what makes a planet livable.
